java-mysql-explain.configuration.filterP: Only print when not match keywords. Split by comma, such as: `QRTZ_,COUNT(0)`
java-mysql-explain.configuration.filterB: Filter out before explain. Only execute when not match keywords. Split by comma, such as: `INSERT,UPDATE,DELETE`
Filter by explain **[type]**. Split by comma. Print all when using `*`. Level: `system,const,eq_ref,ref,range,index,ALL`
Filter by explain **[Extra]**. Split by comma. Print all when using `*`. Scope: `Using filesort,Using temporary,Using where,Using index condition`
